data.news_body: Resignation of M/s. Ankit Goyanka & Associates Chartered Accountants as Internal Auditors of the Company effective from April 03 2025 due to preoccupation and other personal reasons.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Resignation of Director
data.news_body: Mr. Virenderkumar Mehta (DIN:10207689) has tendered his resignation on April 1 2025 as Non-Executive Independent Director and the same was intimated to the Stock Exchange on April 1 2025. However the said resignation would affect the composition of the Board and its committees. On the request of the Board Mr. Virenderkumar Mehta has graciously accepted the request and extended the resignation date effective to close of business hours on Tuesday April 8 2025. Consequently he will cease to be the member of Audit Committee Nomination & Remuneration Committee and Risk Management Committee with effect from April 8 2025.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Resignation of Director
data.news_body: Resignation of Mr. Virenderkumar Mehta as Non-Executive Independent Director w.e.f closing of business hours of April 1 2025. Mr. Virenderkumar Mehta also ceases to be member of Audit Committee Nomination & Remuneration Committee and Risk Management Committee.
